author: Zac Hall
title: COO exit creates unanswered questions about Apple Watch and Health future
description: Apple made an interesting omission in yesterday’s chief operating officer transition announcement. Design, which previously reported to COO Jeff Williams, will soon report to CEO Tim Cook, but the press release stopped short of explaining where Williams’ othe…
